Burkuna Faso - Fonds de Developpement
            Rural Troisieme Projet

abstracts.cdata!:
The project -a follow-up to two quite
            successful Rural Development Fund projects- aimed at
            developing a reliable and cost-effective capability for
            managing small-scale rural investments. The specific
            sub-project types identified were to increase crop and
            fuel-wood production, improve the availability of safe
            drinking water for rural communities and increase the value
            of agriculture produce through processing and better storage.
